mapper.select: select id, uid, name, address, port, account, username, password, isSSL, isTLS, createTime, updateTime, valid, remark from m_email_setting where id = #{id} and uid = #{uid} and valid = 1
mapper.delete: update m_email_setting set valid = 0 where id = #{id} and uid = #{uid}
mapper.update: update m_email_setting set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isSSL = #{isSSL,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, isTLS = #{isTLS,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, updateTime = current_timestamp, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
